thread.title: Wonderful Roma.
thread.title_full: Wonderful Roma. - Review of Hotel Diocleziano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: babsbuckuk
title: Wonderful Roma.
text:
This was our second visit to the Hotel Diocleziano and it didn't disappoint. Our room was spotlessly clean and comfortable.The staff are welcoming, polite and professional. Nothing was too much trouble. The hotel should be very proud of their staff, they are a credit to the hotel especially Lavinia and Giordando on reception. The hotel is a convenient short distance from the Termini.
Room Tip: Rooms at the back are quieter. See more room tips
